channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: Eclipse (yacht)
item.description: M/Y Eclipse is a superyacht built by Blohm+Voss of Hamburg, Germany, the third longest afloat. Her exterior and interior were designed by Terence Disdale. The yacht is owned by Roman Abramovich, and was delivered on 9 December 2010. At 162.5 metres (533 ft 2 in) long Eclipse was the world's longest private yacht until Azzam was launched in April 2013, which is 17.3 metres (56 ft 9 in) longer. The yacht's cost has been estimated at â‚¬340 million.
